means: 骗人的疗法，有专利权的药品

word_mean: ［拉］秘方：江湖的、专利的或秘密的药

sentence.Network_en: Some nostrum peddled as a cure for unemployment.
sentence.Network_cn: 鼓吹可解决失业问题的妙策.

sentence.Network_en: He told the patient that he had a nostrum.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... nostomania 怀乡狂 nostrum 秘方 notability 值得注意.
秘_百度百科 ... ◎ 秘室[ back room] ◎ 秘药[ nostrum] ◎ 秘鲁[ Peru].
seduction的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... frumenty 香甜牛奶麦粥... nostrum 万能药, 成药, 妙方 ... duvet 羽绒被.
IELTS单词易混字表_沪江雅思培训 ... nasal 鼻的, 鼻音的 nostrum 万应灵药,传家宝 haven 避难所；安全的地方.

list.abs: ...的中心，地中海是罗马帝国的“内湖”，罗马人称之为“我们的海”（Mare Nostrum）。
地字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 地质学〖 geology〗 地中海〖 theMediterraneansea;MareNostrum〗 地轴〖 theearth'saxis〗.
...um，意即“大地中间的海”，罗马人把它看作是罗马帝国中心的海，更早些时候，也就是公元1世纪时，曾称“诺斯特鲁姆海”（Mare nostrum），意即“我们的海”。波罗的海（Baltic Sea）位于欧洲北部，主要部分处于瑞典、波兰和俄罗斯西北.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin, used in the sense ('something) of our own making', neuter of noster 'our'

entry.tran: (尤指老式的或有欠缺的)解决方案;未必奏效的计策
entry.def: You can refer to ideas or theories about how something should be done as nostrums, especially when you think they are old-fashioned or wrong in some way.

example.ex: ...clinging to the nostrums of the dying century.
example.tran: 对上世纪的招数紧抓不放

entry.tran: (未经科学证明有效的)灵丹妙药，神药
entry.def: If you refer to a medicine as a nostrum, you mean that it is not effective or has not been tested in a proper scientific way.

example.ex: ...pills, tablets, and other nostrums claiming to be magic potions.
example.tran: 声称包治百病的药丸、药片和其他灵丹妙药

means.word_mean: 1. hypothetical remedy for all ills or diseases; once sought by the alchemists
2. patent medicine whose efficacy is questionable

auth_sentence.content: Another party's nostrum is, more churches, more schools, more clergymen.

auth_sentence.content: Putting into a tiny Italian harbor one day, they were surrounded by a group of swimmers shouting Mare nostrum!
